description: Defines a tenant to which the user is associated.

isAdmin.description:
User is admin within the context of this tenant.
 There is no need to set the is_device_admin and is_gateway_admin flags.

isDeviceAdmin.description:
User is able to modify device related resources (applications,
 device-profiles, devices, multicast-groups).

isGatewayAdmin.description: User is able to modify gateways.

title: User Tenant Link
